text: ungē māṁśa hō ungē rudhiraya hō allāh veta nolæbennēmaya. enamut ohu veta læbenuyē num̆balā aturin vū biya bætimatkamayi. num̆balāṭa ohu maga penvū dǣ venuven num̆balā allāh va śrēṣṭhatvayaṭa pat karanu piṇisa api un vasan̆ga kara dunnemu. tavada dæhæmiyanhaṭa (nabivaraya!) num̆ba śubhāraṁci danvā siṭinu
